author: forthommel
body:
Following the merge of #25777, this PR introduces the new CondFormat for timing calibration for the local reconstruction algorithms for vertical (Totem UFSD) and horizontal (PPS diamond) timing detectors. Currently, only the latter is being matched and used in the PPS offline reconstruction.
Additionally, a few `get` prefixes were stripped from the `TotemTimingConversions` accessors, in preparation for the future CMS coding conventions matchings to the PPS code (see #25690 and CTPPS#40).

Currently, the new payload has not been uploaded to the conditions DB, hence the test in `RecoCTPPS/TotemRPLocal/test/totemTiming_reco_cfg.py` has been adapted to use the JSON in the meantime. This behaviour will be adapted in a later review stage of this PR.

cc: @nminafra
title: DB usage for Totem/PPS timing local reconstruction
